column5: I have been looking at under water cameras,really wanted to go the GOPRO way,but was siting on the fence. The mrs,s and I decided not to get each others gifts this year,and concentrate on the grand kids.We get each other stuff all the time anyways.  Well,she didnt keep her side of the bargain. Yesterday,she comes up to me and says,here ya go,it,s not a Christmas gift.   I was handed a bag,and what was inside   Well first off,it was out with the old,it has served me well,,,,,,,,,,,    And in with the new,,,,,,,,,  XP50         Man I cant wait to hit the water with this. Under water shots/videos, are going to be so cool. Fuji has some real good stuff on youtube to learn about the camera.    I had to get her something now,and I did. I,ll just give her the gift Christmas day,and say,it,s not a Christmas gift.  First pic I took.
nice  looks like I got a gopro hero 3 under the tree to go with mt hero 2 now it will be one under the ice and one above the ice
Were going to have lots more fun now bud.
just as long as the cameras are not pointed at me when/if I screw up........lol  no blooper tape
Lookin' good Brian.
I guess it can NEVER be pointed in your direction, eh?
Very cool Brian you got a great little missus buddy.   Art
Let Brian take pics of you Terry. We like your shirts!
Hey B, I think the Mrs has been watching a bit extra of the Facts of Fishing if you ask me...
Get a floater strap 'cause they sink.
Yep,on my list Rob. I,m also going to make a holder for it,so I can see what some of the holes I fish,look like.  This is going to be fun.   Thanks all,shes a keeper.
Those Fuji's take surprisingly nice shots...and yes, they really are shock-proof...
Very nice Brian,you'll have a lot of fun with that!!!Merry Christmas!!
Thanks Dave. The same to you and yours my friend.
Betty made a good choice B.  I really like our Fuji  Merry Christmmas to you both

Nice! We got our son the same camera for x-mas this year as well. He should put it to good use on his trips to costa rica......since he wrecked my camera going in some waterfall or something the last time he went. lol

And to you and Paul J.  I got out for a few hours this morning on the riv. Water was way to cold to try under water shots with bare hands.  It does take nice shots.      Everyone have a great day. My little Lilly, is on her way.Cant wait.
Nice pics for sure Brian.  That pool just screams steelies, you must have slayed them.
:ninja:
Wow do I ever need to get up there! very nice B.
